page.name: partners
page.title: Partners
page.subtitle: OpenAMQ Partners
page.content:
OpenAMQ Partners ****************
Our partners offer a wide range of OpenAMQ-related services and support that match the needs and expectations of your business.
Global Partners ===============
- Xyz, Inc. offers OpenAMQ-based enterprise messaging systems designed specifically for the financial market. The Xyz, Inc. range of products come with a global service and support package. More: website link.
- Abcd, Inc. provides certified OpenAMQ engineers to global businesses seeking to leverage OpenAMQ in their enterprise architectures. More: website link.
- Jklm Inc,., the leader in financial standards conformance, offers their range of JklmTools packages running on OpenAMQ. More: website link.
Regional Partners =================
Europe ------
Americas --------
Local Partners ==============
Become an OpenAMQ Partner *************************
Commodity middleware like OpenAMQ creates wide-ranging opportunities for new business and service models. We work with the leaders in respective fields to define robust, well-integrated value propositions that benefit our customers. If your firm fits the profile, contact us.
